Package code

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgeUtility
    Creates units and reads hardcoded information from a file and communicates that to the display.
    AIPlayer
    Simulates computer player as opponent.
    Display
    Displays buttons for the human to click, the player's bases, and the humans current gold and xp.
    HumanPlayer
    Normal player that interacts with the display.
    Player
    Abstract class that is responsible for deciding whether to build a unit each move cycle.
    Unit
    Fights opponent units and has ability to damage home base.
    War
    Handles displaying the game, updating the player stats.
    Yagura
    Shoots enemy units within range.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidTypeException
    Exception thrown when unit or yagura type does not exist.
